data.text: More than half of the world’s population without internet access lives in Asia. This is what governments are doing to bridge the digital divide https://t.co/gABFbqeZsT #IMF_VTI https://t.co/vR2vyoCxf1

.@Lagarde: #Argentina has developed a strengthened economic plan to bolster confidence and stabilize the economy. I support Argentina’s revised reform plan and believe it will be instrumental to restore confidence and protect the most vulnerable. https://t.co/qmkPCPUfeJ

IMF staff and #Argentina agree on stronger economic policies while protecting the most vulnerable. The revised Arrangement doubles IMF financing through end 2019, making extra US$19 billion available, subject to Board approval. https://t.co/bD7F57JoMJ https://t.co/0Q71hqPg8v

IMF staff and #Argentina agree on stronger economic policies while still protecting the most vulnerable. IMF financing is front loaded by US$19b through end of 2019, and overall Fund support totals $57.1b through 2021, subject to Board approval. https://t.co/yQ7WIQycVK https://t.co/EoonOzAOUf
